title: ダイヤモンドSにむけて

text_block_list.text: The day of the 'Diamond S'.

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: Hmm, hmm, today you seem unusually full of fighting spirit...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes! I set a goal at the start of the year, so I'm feeling motivated to do my best this year!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: My fighting spirit is at full power! My mind and body are pumped up!

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: I see...! Your passion for victory really comes through! I'll make sure to convey it to everyone responsibly!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes, thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Hey, it's Matikanetannhauser! Lucky!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: I became a fan after the 'Kikuka Sho'! I'm really looking forward to the race!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa!? Oh, thank you!

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: I've heard many voices hoping for your success, ever since your strong performances in the classic races.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wha, really!?

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: Yes... and I must say, I'm one of them.

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: Um... do you remember that day I interviewed you at Tracen Academy before?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Interview...? Oh, maybe right after the 'Satsuki Sho'!

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: That's right...! Your words back then really saved me, in a way.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Sa, saved...?

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: Well... this is personal and embarrassing, but I was stuck in my work, so to speak.

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: I felt I'd hit my limit with my poor interviewing skills and mediocre articles...

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: But... seeing you firmly declare yourself as 'not special'—

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: and still aiming for 'victory' like that, it really struck a chord with me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no, that's...!

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: I had given up on myself somewhere, resigned to being ordinary, so seeing you call yourself 'normal' yet never give up looked so brilliant to me...

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: It made me feel like I could have hope too... or like you were pushing me on the back to try harder.

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: ...Ah! Sorry, suddenly talking like this!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no, not at all! In fact, I'm happy!

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: Good luck in the race! I'll be cheering for you from the shadows! ...Well then!
The round-glasses reporter bowed her head, then headed into the racecourse with her heavy-looking bag in hand.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...That was a nice story.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Hmm, today I'm really... going to do my best! Let's go, Trainer!
Pushed forward by unexpected people, the 'Diamond S' began.
